CustomField.description: Holds status values for respective Record Types separated by ,(without any spaces). e.g. New,Backlog Item,In Progress,Blocked,Redirected,Completed,Rejected
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Holds status values for respective Record Types separated by ,(without any spaces). e.g. New,Backlog Item,In Progress,Blocked,Redirected,Completed,Rejected
CustomField.label: Status
